Okay, so I need to figure out who is struggling in the class based on the information given. The teacher asked two students—African American and Latino—to stay after class. However, when she talked to the Latino student, she was disappointed that they weren't keeping up with others and suggested some tutors.

From this context, it seems like the teacher is indicating that one of these two students isn't performing as well as the other. On the other hand, the African American student was commended and given an opportunity to participate further.
